name: War and Peace: Civil War
description:
Test your history knowledge in the most addictive strategy MMO with a realistic American Civil War theme! TRAIN massive armies of Civil War cannons, go to war with thousands of REAL players, form powerful alliances and develop YOUR OWN military strategies.

Enjoy a worldwide connection, play with different nationalities while taking pride in your own!

FEATURES
✔ Build iconic Civil War cannons
✔ Develop your town & research technologies
✔ Use FREE Speed Ups to develop faster
✔ Choose your side: North vs South
✔ Wave the Union flag or the Confederate flag
✔ Forge Alliances with other commanders
✔ Use brute force and subterfuge to defeat players
✔ Chat in real time with your friends
✔ Join troops with allied commanders
✔ Fight for the President title
✔ Conquer the White House
✔ Get advised by A. Lincoln or J. Davis
✔ Strategise with Ulysses S. Grant or Robert E. Lee
✔ Compete in real-time with players in daily events
✔ Collect massive rewards from military missions
✔ Dress up your Commander for powerful buffs
✔ Experience a hardcore military game set in 1861-1865 America
✔ Become a VIP player and gain game-changing bonuses
✔ Reach the top of the rankings and earn the respect of the whole world
✔ Explore the World Map to gather rsources, scout enemies or defeat rebellious armies
✔ Discover multiple strategic options and diplomatic choices!

Join a world of war and test yourself against real players worldwide! PLAY NOW!
